title: Drawing, "Drawings.  Studies from Colombia.  A. Houses in Alatico.  B.  A goat in Pandi", July 1853
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at center left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at upper right: Lugt 457d / 1917.84 A.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top:  Grass thatch - plaster white / if washed and yellow in the rough; and at lower left:  Alatico - July - 53 -
description: Horizontal view of a house and part of another seen behind it shown at upper left corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawings.  Studies from Colombia.  A. Houses in Alatico.  B.  A goat in Pandi", July 1853.
July 1853. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-84-a.
